conbody.p: Download the DITA source from . You're free to use the source in any of your own materials and change it if you need to. This DITA code isn't designed as an exemplar of good DITA coding style (I'm a writer not a coder), but you could also use it to learn the basics or to provide some examples of the basics to others.
